body.name: Meritpick Snack Bowl for Stanley 40 oz Tumbler with Handle, Snack Tray for Stanley Cup 40 oz, Reusable Snack Ring & Finger Chopsticks & Straw Cover Cap for Stanley Cup Accessories (Pink)

features: 【Easy to Reach Snacks】Are you tired of struggling to reach your snacks? With this snack bowl for Stanley cup will solve your problem! The four food compartments can be separated to hold popcorn, fries, chips, melon seeds, etc., making it possible for you to enjoy snacks anytime, anywhere without compromising on your drink!

【Safe Material】 Our Snack Tray for Stanley is made of ABS high temperature resistant food grade material, which can be reused many times over a long period of time, and the surface of this product is smooth and very easy to clean.
【Huge Capacity】 Our Snack Container has three compartments to provide you with space to place different delicious flavors, and each compartment is 1.8" deep, making it easy to eat all at once.

【Convenient to Use】Snack ring for Stanley is very easy to install, just press down the slot of the snack ring into the handle of the cup, which is perfect to put into the car cup holder, when you or with family driving out of the car you could enjoy the snacks while enjoying your juice or soda, making your life more interesting!

【Perfect Fits for Stanley Cup】The snack tray is designed for Stanley 40 oz tumblers with handle and fits both 1.0 and 2.0 cups(𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗲: 𝗡𝗼𝘁 𝗳𝗶𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝟯𝟬 𝗼𝘇 𝘁𝘂𝗺𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗿𝘀), ensuring the seamless fit and optimal performance. If you would like to apply it to other tumbler cups, please measure the diameter of your cup before purchasing
body.description: This is new designed snack bowl, which is specially designed for 40oz Stanley tumbler. We use high quality silicone, which is safe in the dishwasher. Please confirm your cup model before purchasing. Fits for 16 oz, 20 oz, 24 oz, 32 oz and 40 oz Stanley tumblers. Package includes: 1 x silicone snack tray + 1 x straw. Please check the size before purchasing. If you have any questions about our products, please contact us in time, we will give you a satisfactory answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this snack cup! I bought a Stanley and this cup as Christmas gifts for all my cousin and they loved them! It is a soft, flexible silicone material and it comes with a cute little straw topper accessory as well. Perfect for gifting a Stanley loving friend. Ordering one for myself now!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stanley snack holder for cup
reviews.reviewText: This is a neat idea, but the piece itself is a bit unstable on the cup. It is a good product, but I think that I just did not like it for myself. Only fits on a 40 ox. Stanley so be cautious of the size before you purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Larger than I expected
reviews.reviewText: This will be great for a substantial quantity of snacks. I love the cute chopsticks, too! The only thing I don’t like is that the chopsticks and straw cover are actually white and the bowl itself is yellowish, and it would be nice if they matched.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for some of my stanley cups and more often for some of my stanley cup dupes. It is silicone so really nice to put on and it's really easy to clean. The only drawback is when you're washing it. You handwash it and dry it, the fibers of your towel are going to stick to the silicone, you put this in the dishwasher and it dries with spots on it. No win win there. I'm just glad there are so many more upsides, like the fit and the ease for travel. This is perfect for road trips and traveling on a plane. I have a plastic snack bowl as well, but for travel I definitely prefer the silicone one because it's a lot easier to pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and funny
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted a snackee cup and she already had the "stanley" cup so I got her this. She loves it and thinks it is so fun to use. It also came with a few cute accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silicone snack ring fits Stanley well
reviews.reviewText: The silicone snack ring fits the top of the cup well. The straw holder is the right size for the straw. I don't love the straw holder design- wish it was more unisex than a flower cup, but like that is cup-ception of a cup with a straw on a cup with a straw. The snack chopsticks are too small for my fingers. Even putting them at the last knuckle, they're made for petite hands, but they have a kawaii bunny so I imagine they're perfect for teens. Easy to clean the snack tray and that's why you're buying this silicone one instead of others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color is... weird
reviews.reviewText: I really don't like the color of this snack bowl. I understand the listing says this color is "oange", but thought orange was implied. However, the color is more of a pastel peach/mustard yellow. With that being said, it DOES work as advertised. it slips right on to the lid and sits securely hugging the cup handle. Mine came with a plastic chopstick set that has little finger... handles? on the back, made for small kids (or adults like me that don't know hw to use chopsticks properly Lol.) But I can see how they would be useful when eating cheetos/cheezeballs to keep your fingers clean. I did not, however, receive the brown bear straw cover. Foe the price I'd expect to receive all items listed, and honestly, I'm still having a really hard time getting over the terrible color. But if you can look past that this may be for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Husband loves this!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great item for the "snackers" in your life! I let me husband use this while watching a movie so that I didn't have to hear wrappers!! It is soft, flexible and easy to clean...plus it came with a cute straw topper and a chop stick thing to eat your snacks with!
